lines.text: Motion has horizontal and vertical components

secText:
Lesson:
1. Experiment with [OBJ:actsec_h554:circular motion] by driving a car around a track.
2. Define [OBJ:expsec_h555:circular motion].
3. Define [OBJ:expsec_h556:uniform circular motion].
4. Define and calculate [OBJ:expsec_5180:period].
5. Define and calculate [OBJ:expsec_h557:centripetal acceleration].
6. Experiment with [OBJ:actsec_h558:centripetal acceleration] by racing a car around a track.

In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_36929:Calculate] rotational period for an object in orbit.
2. [OBJ:qc_36933:Calculate] centripetal acceleration.
